review: I have had this for over a week now and I love it. I use it for watching YouTube on a 40" LED TV. It works seamlessly with my iPad and a Windows 7 laptop running Chrome. Setup was pretty easy as well.There are not a lot of Apps that you can use this with at the moment. I have two Roku boxes that don't support Youtube. Instead of dropping $99 for a new Roku3 box, I chose to get this for less than a third of the price.If you don't have a streaming box, this is a great (and cheaper) alternative for watching Youtube, Netflix and Hulu Plus on your HDTV.
author: DenverGuy "DenverGuy"

review: We have been wanting a smart tv, but love our current tv and really don't want to dish out the money for a new tv right now. I have always wanted Apple TV, but didn't want to spend the money for that either and was skeptical it was worth it.We love chromecast. It was extremely easy to set up and use, and we use it the time from our Laptop, iPhones, and tablet/iPad. We were amazed at the quality and how fun Netflix is now.We are hoping to be able to pull up movies and other websites other than just the available apps right now, I've heard it is possible, I just have to figure out how. If you are looking to play music, YouTube, and netflix....this is so worth every penny!
